Hey, I'm Lucy :)

I’m the Co-Founder of Trefiel - think skin care meets self-care - which I started with my partner, Michael Tremeer, when we saw the opportunity to spoil and pamper women everywhere (and teach them how to love themselves too).

I think we have the best face masks ever but I have to admit, I’m very biased.

I like to write about what has and hasn't worked while growing my ecommerce business, processes that streamline our operations and templates that organise everything (with a specific focus on running a remote team) and basically everything in between because it's my blog and I'll do what I want.

Let's do this!
